title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Collaborative and Reflective Design Projects for Social Studies Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational technology knowledge and social studies lesson design experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners iteratively revise and develop visual design maps using tools like Cacoo at least three times for social studies lesson planning
Learners derive at least five improvement points in the design process through peer feedback and reflective journaling
Learners collaboratively complete and submit social studies project proposals reflecting historical contexts (e.g., time-travel themes)
Learners apply IDT theories (e.g., ADDIE model) to actual lesson design and explain at least three decision-making rationales
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
